Description:
Basketball legend Michael Jordan is both subject and star of this video, which begins with a dizzying montage of Jordan&#039;s spectacular moves on the court. That&#039;s followed by dramatic feature about a dejected teenager who doesn&#039;t make the cut at a high school basketball team tryout but who winds up, as if by magic, getting coaching from Jordan himself. Pertinent clips from Jordan&#039;s college and pro career illustrate particular points as he delivers lessons about determination and "heart." Some of Jordan&#039;s teammates and illustrious opponents also appear in interview segments to talk about his fierce will to win. Rounding out Michael Jordan&#039;s Playground is a music video, in which Jordan even does a little dancing. This video is always entertaining, and chances are it would be helpful as a motivational tool for a young player.
